# carefree-cv

`carefree-cv` implemented some commonly used computer vision functions and modules


## Installation

`carefree-cv` requires Python 3.8 or higher.

```bash
pip install carefree-cv
```

or

```bash
git clone https://github.com/carefree0910/carefree-cv.git
cd carefree-cv
pip install -e .
```
